item.title: Jenny Han Always Knew How ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Would End
item.description: The novelist turned power producer discusses rewriting the conclusion of her own adaptation, what being “Team Conrad” or “Team Jeremiah” might say about you and the siren call of the comments section:
